price: 59.Diggah Qhiyaamah ayro amaatc- le, tet mamut agay waaga mali, kinnih immay sinaamak maggo mari (koros kinnuk) tet mamut ma- nummaysa.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ لَأٓتِيَةٞ لَّا رَيۡبَ فِيهَا وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: inna al-sāʿata laātiyatun lā rayba fīhā walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yu'minūna
